unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Identifying Parameters
question_text: When performing a significance test for a least-squares regression line, what parameter can be tested?

choices.text: The proportion of observations that lie on the line.
The average x x -value in a set of observations that determine a roughly linear relationship.
The mean y y -value in a set of observations that determine a roughly linear relationship.
The slope of the line relating two quantitative variables.
The variability found in the sample.
